item.title: erobay.com
item.description: erobay.com is (according to themselves) “the main BDSM calendar serving the Bay Area. If you look here you will see most of the classes, munches, parties, and other events taking place.

item.title: Folsom St Fair
item.description: Folsom St Fair is the largest BDSM event in the world. It takes place on the last Sunday of September each year in [[notes/South of Market|SoMa]].

item.title: Leather Alley
item.description: Leather Alley is an area of the San Francisco Pride celebration where there are BDSM demos, performances, and venues.

item.title: Naked Mondays
item.description: Naked Mondays is a weekly play party for gay men at [[notes/Transform 1060|Transform 1060]].

item.title: PlayXLand
item.description: PlayXLand (pronounced “playland”) is a BDSM event that occurs every Wednesday night at [[notes/Cat Club|Cat Club]]. Aside from being a normal bar serving alcohol with DJs, there is a limited play space in the back room where there are one or more sawhorse-style spanking benches, a St.

item.title: Release
item.description: Release is an open play party that happens monthly at [[notes/Transform 1060|Transform 1060]]. Links Transform 1060 Event Calendar

item.title: Twisted Windows
item.description: Twisted Windows is a production company that hosts BDSM performances and play events. Some of their events are freestanding, and some are single stages within larger events, such as [[notes/Folsom St Fair|Folsom St Fair]] and [[notes/Leather Alley|Leather Alley]].

item.title: U-HAUL
item.description: U-HAUL is a weekly dance event at [[notes/Jolene’s|Jolene’s]] for lesbians. They normally have go-go dancers and DJs playing live music.

item.title: Up Your Alley
item.description: Up Your Alley, also known as “Dore Alley” is a yearly BDSM street fair in [[notes/South of Market|SoMa]]. It happens on the last Sunday of July every year.
